name: Canvas/Instructure Dark Mode (BCPS)
description: Something that I made when I was bored. I'll continue to update this theme and refine it as I go along. This was personally suppose to be only mine, but I guess other students in other counties can use this. The only problem is that there's the Broward logo in the upper left and right hand corner (may or may not appear for you as well). This theme also includes various fixes such as positioning issues and corrected padding.
additional_info:
Version 3.6, 3/3/18
ᅚᅚ- Fixed wrong color for test submission details border

Version 3.5, 12/13/17
ᅚᅚ- Fixed ugly underline appearing for links/some texts

Version 3.4b, 10/25/17
ᅚᅚ! This is in beta since I cannot receive messages on canvas, I can only send them, unless a teacher sends me a message, but we do not communicate using this method. If there are more things to be corrected color wise, I would welcome that you help me test them.
ᅚᅚ- Darkened Inbox messages (sent tab)
ᅚᅚ- Darkened a couple borders within the Inbox messages (sent, again)
ᅚᅚ- Fixed announcements showing wrong colors
ᅚᅚ- A lot of other stuff for the teacher panel has been fixed.

Version 3.3, 10/23/17
ᅚᅚ- Darkened another border seen while taking quizzes
ᅚᅚ- Fixed alignment with the "HTML Editor" and the "Keyboard Shortcuts" buttons above text input boxes
ᅚᅚ- Fixed text box blending into background on some pages (quizzes, etc.)
ᅚᅚ- Fixed text box formatting tools also blending into background on pages that have a text box input 
ᅚᅚ- Added border to separate text box and the text box formatting tools

Version 3.2, 10/1/17
ᅚᅚ- Darkened parts of the "Student Resources" page
ᅚᅚ- Completely darkened table borders

Version 3.1, 9/25/17
ᅚᅚ- Darkened quiz comment background

Version 3.0, 9/21/17
ᅚᅚ- Small change to quiz instruction page

Version 2.9, 9/20/17
ᅚᅚ- Changes to Course Stream page:
ᅚᅚᅚᅚ- Darkened white borders
ᅚᅚᅚᅚ- Fixed hover colors
ᅚᅚᅚᅚ- Darkened border and changed border from dotted to solid on dropdown

Version 2.8, 9/19/17
ᅚᅚ- Darkened rubric details on assignment page (if your assignment has a rubric)

Version 2.7, 9/16/17
ᅚᅚ- Darkened scroll bar (globally applied)
ᅚᅚ- Removed border and corrected positioning on assignment box on submission details page
ᅚᅚ- Changes made to calendar page:
ᅚᅚᅚᅚ- Darkened assignment details
ᅚᅚᅚᅚ- Darkened background on edit event
ᅚᅚᅚᅚ- Fixed padding on "Date" box 
ᅚᅚᅚᅚ- Fixed padding on calendar button next to "Date" box
ᅚᅚᅚᅚ- Removed border and darkened text input box on the "Create New Calendar Event" page

Version 2.6, 9/14/17
ᅚᅚ! Thanks for the positive feedback and the installs!
ᅚᅚ- Darkened file permissions dialog
ᅚᅚ- Darkened "flash" notifications when deleting a file (or whenever they pop up)
ᅚᅚ- Darkened border on assignment details
ᅚᅚ- Made corners pointed on the progress storage bar on the "Files" tab
ᅚᅚ- Made corners pointed on the "View" and "Download" buttons on the files tab
ᅚᅚ- Fixed black border on grade summary details
ᅚᅚ- Fixed read/unread/subscribe buttons on discussions using wrong border colors when focused on
ᅚᅚ- Removed blue border when focused on links/urls

Version 2.5, 9/8/2017
ᅚᅚ- Darkened discussion page responses
ᅚᅚ- Darkened discussions list
ᅚᅚ- Darkened several borders on syllabus page
ᅚᅚ- A lot more darkened (I'm sorry if I can't get every page that doesn't look right or a page that needs to be darkened. I'm only limited to my courses, and it seems like every course has something different that needs to be darkened. Despite this, I'm trying my best to darken everything)

Version 2.4, 9/7/2017
ᅚᅚ- Darkened "Files" header tab
ᅚᅚ- Fixed text color when hovering over course buttons
ᅚᅚ- Fixed right arrow turning blue when being collapsed
ᅚᅚ- Fixed white border around arrow button when clicked on
ᅚᅚ- Fixed hovering colors on arrow buttons on Calendar page
ᅚᅚ- Made link text on modules page whiter when hovered over

Version 2.3, 9/6/17
ᅚᅚ- Updated color on all borders
ᅚᅚ- Darkened all buttons
ᅚᅚ- Darkened Date and Type boxes
ᅚᅚ- Darkened conference page (beta)
ᅚᅚ- Darkened boxes on modules page
ᅚᅚ- Darkened discussion assignments
ᅚᅚ- Darkened files page
ᅚᅚ- Removed borders on the boxes of the modules page
ᅚᅚ- Fixed buttons affected by the darkened buttons
ᅚᅚ- Fixed the recolor button on the dashboard course cards
ᅚᅚ- Fixed exit buttons with darkened backgrounds (oops)
ᅚᅚ- Fixed unfinished parts of the "People" tab
ᅚᅚ- Fixed unfinished parts of the "Inbox" tab
ᅚᅚ- Fixed hover color on the "Courses" tab

Version 2.2, 9/5/17
ᅚᅚ- Removed some unnecessary borders on submission details screen
ᅚᅚ- Removed extra border on course menu and darkened box as a supplement
ᅚᅚ- Darkened discussions page (boxes)

Version 2.1, 9/4/17
ᅚᅚ- Fixed white BPCS logo in the upper right hand corner on the dashboard/course selection screen (finally)
ᅚᅚ- Fixed random border on upcoming and recent feedback boxes introduced in the last revision (sorry)
ᅚᅚ- Changed card color on dashboard/course selection screen from white to black
ᅚᅚ- Changed all #ccc colors to #aaa colors (easier to read on white some white backgrounds, good happy medium)
ᅚᅚ- Changed all boxes to have a pointed corner instead of a rounded corner
ᅚᅚ- Darkened calendar
ᅚᅚ- Darkened inbox page
ᅚᅚ- Darkened quiz page/quiz result page
ᅚᅚ- Darkened "people" page in course menu
ᅚᅚ- Darkened bottom border color on name tray
ᅚᅚ- Darkened container for course rename/color tab
ᅚᅚᅚᅚ-- Removed white arrow from the course rename tab

Version 2.0, 9/3/17
ᅚᅚ! Full release, out of beta
ᅚᅚ- Removed blue highlights on tray buttons
ᅚᅚ- Removed text underlining
ᅚᅚ- Fixed red highlighted button when in course menu
ᅚᅚᅚᅚ-- Fixed button highlighting, also in course menu
ᅚᅚ- Fixed some white areas into the correct colors
ᅚᅚ- Fixed some borders being too white
ᅚᅚ- Fixed account tray's color
ᅚᅚ- Fixed "Search assignment box" being too close to the top of the page (only on some courses that has this)
ᅚᅚ- Fixed blue highlighting on hide button the course menu
ᅚᅚ- Fixed sequence module (next button and previous button)'s color on assignments page
ᅚᅚ- Fixed font size on "Dashboard" text on the dashboard/course selection screen (my mistake, was messing around with it and forgot to change it back)

Version 1.0 Beta, 9/3/17
ᅚᅚ- Release

discussions.name: Works well, best Instructure style out right now.
Works perfectly for Penn State's Canvas site. Thank you!
